notes.note: Infinite loop detection is currently NOT implemented.

methods.method: Lists all files and directories in the user's current working directory and writes them to the output.
Prints the name of the given files and lists all files contained in directories for every directory in {@code files}.
Prints the name of the given files and lists all files contained in directories for every directory in {@code files}.
Lists all files and directories in the user's current working directory and writes them to the output using the given options specifying the details of the output format.

options.option: Lists all files in the given directory, including hidden files (those whose names start with \".\" in Unix). By default, these files are excluded from the list.
Print sizes in human readable format. (e.g., 1K, 234M, 2G, etc.)
Long format, displaying file types, permissions, number of hard links, owner, group, size, date, and filename.
Reverses the order of the sort to get reverse collating sequence or oldest first.
Sorts with the primary key being time modified (most recently modified first) and the secondary key being filename in the collating sequence.
